partintro.para: BlazeDS is an open source project that provides various connecting channels between Flex Client and Java Service such as remoting and messaging Spring enables developing Rich Internet Application based on Spring using Flex by suggesting an easy way to connect with BlazeDS. Anyframe's flex-query plugin provides various Flex UI Samples that can be referenced for installation and also actual development of this BlazeDS and and libraries and configuration files for connection with Spring and BlazeDS.
Install flex query plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked by using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
